771054856396210177.text: We have opened a one-way path towards gender equality. Nothing will bring us back. #Always fight

771054824582504448.text: Future generations will know that in the first time a woman took the presidency, machismo and misogyny showed their ugly faces #LutarSempre

771054757981093888.text: To the Brazilian women, who covered me with flowers and affection, I ask you to believe that you can #LutarSempre

771054468846776321.text: I leave the Presidency as I entered: without having incurred in any illicit act; without betraying any of my commitments #LutarSempre

765624769794441216.text: Who is to decide the future of the Country is our people. Democracy will win.

765624711531393024.text: My hope exists because it is also the democratic hope of the Brazilian people, who elected me twice as president.

765624603955847168.text: I ask the senators not to do the injustice of condemning me for a crime I do not commit. Ñ ​​there is injustice + devastating than condemning an innocent

765624526113734656.text: This process of impeachment is fragile, legally inconsistent, an unfair process, unleashed against an honest and innocent person.

765624154515181568.text: (...) with the sacrifice of the rights guaranteed in the Constitution of 1988.

765624077507825665.text: We must not allow a possible rupture of the democratic order based on impeachment without crime, weaken our democracy (...)

765623082937704448.text: The transition to this new democratic moment requires that a broad dialogue be opened among all the living forces of the Brazilian Nation.

765623028160036864.text: A Pact that strengthens the values ​​of the Democratic State of Law, national sovereignty, economic development and social achievements.

765622983150931969.text: We must build a broad National Pact, based on free and direct elections, that involves all Brazilian citizens.

765622914746093568.text: I will give my unrestricted support to the convening of a plebiscite, with the aim of consulting the population about the early conduct of elections.

765622877668409344.text: Democracy is the only way to build a Pact for National Unity, Development and Social Justice.

765622845267402752.text: I understand that the solution to the political and economic crises we face is through popular vote in direct elections.

765622768729780224.text: It would be an unequivocal coup followed by indirect election.

765622717701816321.text: The electoral college of 110 million voters would be replaced, without constitutional support, by an electoral college of 81 senators.

765622682847158272.text: Consumed the impeachment without crime of responsibility, we would have a coup d'etat.

765622629285916672.text: It is not legitimate to dismiss the president for the "whole of the work". Who pushes the president away for the "whole of the work" is the people, in the elections.

765622586847981568.text: (...) recognizing, in the face of irrefutable evidence, that there was no crime of responsibility. That I'm innocent.

765622555625521152.text: We need to strengthen democracy in our country and, for this, it will be necessary for the Senate to close the process of impeachment in progress (...)

765622509333078016.text: My return to the Presidency, by decision of the Senate, will mean the affirmation of the Democratic State of Right.

608291705113190400.text: Long live Brazil! Live the future of our people! #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608291660875866113.text: Brazilian and Brazilian, the more we unite, the faster we will beat the staples. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608290924012163073.text: (...) lower costs and benefit from a modern infrastructure. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608290889379790848.text: At the same time a fantastic investment effort to mobilize us in the construction of a productive + Country (...)

608290811529318400.text: A huge effort of macroeconomic and fiscal stability to transform our actions into weapons to overcome the crisis that we are going through.

608290731397136384.text: Our great nation needs, today, this double initiative. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608290677101838336.text: Great nations are only firm when they know, when adapting to the new realities, overcome obstacles imposed by them, building new ways.

608290517206597632.text: It is not only in good weather that the future is built, the bridges and foundations + solids of the future are built in times of difficulty

608287229379768320.text: We will also ensure, as we did in the previous stage, legal certainty for investors, with clear and clear regulatory frameworks.

608287117047922688.text: Our goals are: to increase the rate of investment and to make the services + efficient, with reduction of costs and tariffs.

608286980212801537.text: (...) and adequate compensation to the concessionaires for their investments and the services they will provide. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608286915859779586.text: Our concessions model is anchored in two premises: guarantee of quality services, with fair prices for users;

608286877540622337.text: We are making concessions to build, grow and develop. Especially to increase the opportunities to work and produce.

608286011874021376.text: and a reaffirmation of the commitment of our 2nd gov to invest to resume economic growth. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608285944375050241.text: an articulated action with governors in favor of regional development;

608285878084116481.text: a response to the challenges we have in the logistics infrastructure in our country;

608285778175782912.text: These numbers underpin four positive and promising political actions: an expansion of partnership between government and private initiative;

608285627801583616.text: (...) directly benefiting 20 states and 130 Brazilian municipalities. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608285608079958016.text: The new concessions in highways, railways, ports and airports will mobilize investments around R $ 198.4 billion (...)

608285321109884929.text: Like any large set of investments in logistics, its effects will be multiple across the production chain. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608285259814305792.text: (...) but, above all, it is the opening for an even better future. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608285184820183040.text: It is not only the continuity of the successful set of concessions made in my first term (...)

608285054016622592.text: The launch of the Logistics Investment Plan 2015-2018, in its first stage, is part of this rush # OBrasilVaiSeguirAvanzando

608284968108871680.text: Our government is not 4 months, but 4 years! So we're on the starting line and not on the finish line! #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608284769965756416.text: (...) to make our country move forward. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608284756376219649.text: If the difficulties are great, the energy and disposition of the Brazilian people - and their democratic government - are greater.

608284664936210435.text: It means ability to grow, work and produce. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

608284613413347328.text: To remind us once again that, for us, development means investment, employment, income and quality of life.

608284439416852480.text: To say, based on concrete data and actions, that # OBrasilVaiSeguirAvanzando

608284378209390592.text: We are here not only to announce great numbers and ambitious projects, but to renew our commitment to the development of our Country.

608284313923297280.text: Today is a very important day in my second government. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout

605783541616513024.text: We raised resources by 20% to #PlanoSafra and total reached a record of R $ 187.7 billion in 2015/16 http://t.co/14RlHBmUKk http://t.co/zLYgmoq5is

605752063742644224.text: I congratulate the agribusiness producers. We hit a new soybean export record. The victory of a segment is the victory of Brazil.

605751699588968448.text: We are becoming the food barn of the world, and this should be a source of pride for all. #PlanoSafra

605751658333802496.text: Today, we produce food in quantity and quality p /, with fair prices, guarantee the food security of our population. #PlanoSafra

605751363742658561.text: We are showing, with concrete actions, that Brazil at the same time makes adjustments and has a very clear agenda for the future. #PlanoSafra

605751214823866369.text: We are working to bring Brazil back on an accelerated growth path, and we want this to happen in the shortest time possible.

605751154237186049.text: These initiatives will be joined by #PlanoSafra da Agricultura Familiar and #MCMV 3.

605751102240387074.text: (...) we are composing a broad agenda of sustainable growth. #PlanoSafra

605751075216498688.text: With this #PlanoSafra, with the new concessions in infrastructure, with the Exportation Plan and with the Agricultural Defense Plan (...)

605749820872093696.text: We are working to stimulate investment and production, to resume growth on a sustainable basis. #PlanoSafra

605749554865127424.text: We are building a growth agenda, of which this Agricultural and Livestock Plan is one of the components. #PlanoSafra

605749512271986689.text: (...) for Brazil to grow again in the shortest possible time. #PlanoSafra

605749500041379841.text: The common goal of all measures is to improve the economic environment and strengthen confidence in the country (...)

605749406139355137.text: We are making adjustments in the economy, especially in federal government spending. #PlanoSafra

605748832886996992.text: We persist in our strategy of creating a strong rural middle class, anchored in a competitive and sustainable production. #PlanoSafra

605748799869493250.text: The volume of funds for #Pronamp will be raised to R $ 18.9 billion, with a 25% increase in the funding limit for costing. #PlanoSafra

605748691488677888.text: As in previous harvests, we will continue to expand our support to middle-sized producers. #PlanoSafra

605748589348986880.text: It will be R $ 187.7 billion to increase agricultural production and supply both domestic and foreign markets. #PlanoSafra

605748546361524225.text: Even though we are living in a conjuncture of adjustments, we have made great effort and we are increasing in 20% the resources to finance the next harvest.

605748433471848448.text: Once again, we guarantee adequate financing conditions for agribusiness, which segment is a priority for Brazil. #PlanoSafra

601422919110103040.text: Photos of the official visit of Uruguayan President Tabaré Vázquez. #BrasilUruguai http://t.co/atjRLL8ej5

601421430341955585.text: ... committed to the consolidation of an area of ​​peace, cooperation, democracy and growth with social justice in our continent and in the world.

601421352780836864.text: Thank you once + President Tabaré Vázquez for your visit. Uruguay and Brazil will continue inseparable partners (...) #BrazilUruguai

601420931962183680.text: Let us propose to the European Union that we define, as soon as possible, the date of simultaneous presentation of our commercial offers.

601420786533007360.text: The agreement with the European Union is one of the strategic steps in the area of ​​international trade in the region. #BrasilUruguai

601420685467111424.text: We will continue improving Mercosur, overcoming the difficulties of the economy and diversifying our commercial partnerships #BrazilUruguay

601420532622434304.text: We have also advanced in the expansion of the group, with the incorporation of Venezuela, but we need to move further. #BrasilUruguai

601420412258557952.text: Mercosur is an ambitious process of integration in our region, thanks to which we have already achieved significant results. #BrasilUruguai

601420244461166592.text: We exchanged views on the current state of the regional integration process. We agree that Mercosur represents an important common patrimony

601420029075259393.text: Our trade is characterized by a high proportion of processed and manufactured products, such as those of the automotive sector. #BrasilUruguai

601419954378932224.text: Brazil is the main destination of Uruguayan exports and its second foreign supplier. #BrasilUruguai

601419883486806016.text: In the field of trade, our bilateral exchange registered, last year, a historical record, with almost 5 billion dollars. #BrasilUruguai

601419754738425857.text: They are the result of an unprecedented agreement between Uruguay and Brazil, currently under negotiation, which will serve as an example and model for future partnerships.

601419565554376705.text: These initiatives are part of our purpose to establish a process of permanent exchange of electricity between our two countries.

601419411950596097.text: This interconnection project is added to the Uruguayan wind farm Artillerosio, which produces 65MW, which I inaugurated in February.

601419271453941760.text: In the field of energy integration, we welcome the conclusion, in April, of the 411 km San Carlos-Candiota transmission line. #BrasilUruguai

601419019640512512.text: I receive not only the Head of State of a brother country, but a dear political leader, who has done much for the people of his country.

601418811015856128.text: It is a great pleasure to receive in Brazil the President Tabaré Vázquez, in the 1st international visit he realizes after his 2nd election.

600699253481144320.text: I hope that your visit to Brazil will be followed by other opportunities for the people and government to reiterate their esteem and appreciation for China.

600699035700330497.text: (...) an increasingly intense and diversified trade and the deepening of partnerships in education, science, technology and innovation #BrasilChina

600698934256885760.text: It is for this purpose that the three strategic commitments that we renew today must converge: the expansion of investments (..)

600698848898605056.text: We must improve our economic relations, always seeking greater harmony, respect and mutual benefits. #BrasilChina

600698823439208448.text: As a Chinese proverb says, "if the wind blows in a single direction, the tree will grow inclined." #BrasilChina http://t.co/NgHXYgsuvP

600698429342425088.text: I reiterated that it will allow us to deepen our perspective in favor of reforming the UN Security Council. #BrasilChina

600698381879631873.text: This partnership is particularly important in 2015, when the United Nations celebrates its 70th anniversary. #BrasilChina

600698359947599873.text: China and Brazil have played a leading role in building a new global order. #BrasilChina http://t.co/SpaGfdT545

600698201390391296.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: Our partnership also advances in the field of education, technology and innovation.

600698136328335360.text: I am grateful for the partnership in the program # CiênciaSemFronteiras, which today welcomes hundreds of students and researchers. #BrasilChina

600697849937027072.text: All this vast exchange will be further boosted by the decisions we make today. #BrasilChina http://t.co/nCR7RwkUa0

600697675663704065.text: The delivery of the first batch of 22 aircraft, among the 60 sold by Embraer to Tianjin Airlines, is an important milestone in this direction.

600697598589214720.text: We are diversifying the range of Brazilian exports to China, increasing the share of products with higher added value.

600697243868463104.text: New partnerships for trade and productive investment are being signed today. #BrasilChina

600697187429912576.text: China is Brazil's 1st trading partner and in order to intensify our exchange, we have adopted several important measures. #BrasilChina

600697094811168769.text: Our bilateral trade totaled almost 80 billion dollars in 2014. #BrasilChina http://t.co/tIjDDi1goF

600696508544098304.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: A new path to Asia will open to Brazil, reducing distances and costs. #BrasilChina

600696490550566913.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: This is the Transcontinental Railroad that will cross our country in the east-west direction along the southern continent ...

600696479007768576.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: Our three countries - Brazil, Peru and China - begin together feasibility studies for this railway connection ...

600695973233459200.text: (...) which gathers in the areas of electric power, mining, infrastructure and manufacturing, totaling + 53 billion dollars. #BrasilChina

600695895294873601.text: Brazil attaches great importance to the signing of the Agreement on Investment and Productive Capacity (...) #BrasilChina

600695811090022400.text: It is expressed in the various governmental and business agreements signed today, especially in the areas of investment and commerce.

600695679573467136.text: The 2015-2021 Plan of Joint Action, which I signed with the Prime Minister, inaugurates a higher stage in our relationship. #BrasilChina

600695608782036992.text: We had a very productive meeting, marked by frank dialogue and a willingness to move forward, strengthen and make more effective our partnership.

600695542948167680.text: We build, through the principles of equality and mutual trust, the bases for Global Strategic Partnership between #BrasilChina.

600695396252459008.text: This meeting reaffirms the intensity of our relations and follows up on the high level contacts that our governments have made frequent.

600695320511643648.text: To my satisfaction, I welcome the Prime Minister of China, Li Keqiang, accompanied by an expressive governmental and business delegation.

593089902344015874.text: Today it is an early gift, the Jeep Automotive Polo, which extends the certainty of much progress in the coming decades.

593089783540424704.text: On May 5, Goiana will complete 175 years as a city.

593089491843293185.text: Yesterday, a prior license was granted for the stretch between São Lourenço da Mata and Suape do Arco Metropolitano, now we can bid.

593089344388345857.text: The federal government maintains its commitments to Pernambuco.

593087778885341185.text: We will continue working to create a business environment that is increasingly favorable to the Brazilian industry.

593087474903166976.text: I am not ignoring the current deceleration, and we are working to improve the basis for continued production and demand growth.

593086983351705600.text: We are unconditional partners in the development of Pernambuco.

593086810038902785.text: ... of immense impact for the generation of employment and growth of the State.

593086687628099584.text: I highlight the role of 2 Pernambucans: former governor Eduardo Campos and former President Lula, committed to the development of the state.

593086581709373440.text: This factory is the result of a partnership: on the one hand, one of the largest automobile companies in the world, on the other, Brazil and Pernambuco.

593086049028612096.text: Inaugurating this industrial unit of the Fiat Chrysler Group gives me immense satisfaction and pride.

586920345036333056.text: It is our responsibility to make this century a period of peace and development for all. #CumPanama

586920248915398656.text: The VII Summit inaugurates a new era in hemispheric relations, where we can live with different visions, without rigid revenues or impositions.

586919956782194689.text: Four themes are especially relevant: security, education, migration and climate change. #CumPanama

586919905716473857.text: Cooperation facilitates the search for solutions to problems common to our countries. #CumPanama

586919804533092353.text: That is why we reject the adoption of sanctions against Venezuela. The current picture in this brother country calls for moderation and approximation of positions.

585090456695996416.text: I wish the new minister a lot of success at work, in which you can count on me always and with all the other ministers. #PosseMEC

585090261438570496.text: Renato Janine Ribeiro is a happy novelty: an educating minister for an Educating Country. #PosseMEC

585090168832536576.text: To consolidate the construction of this utopia of a homeland that educates its children and young people, I invited a teacher and a passionate for education.

585089993061888000.text: Who could be more appropriate to lead this transformation at this moment than a teacher? #PosseMEC

585089909599432704.text: The fourth axis will be to stimulate the use of technologies and techniques in the training process. #PosseMEC

585089833162428417.text: The third axis is to have well-qualified, well-paid and stimulated teachers and directors. #PosseMEC

585089779253010432.text: The second axis is the change in the curricular and pedagogical paradigm of basic education. #PosseMEC

585089726048251904.text: The first of these axes will be the construction of cooperative federalism in basic education. #PosseMEC

585089645823844354.text: We propose a national effort to qualify basic education to change the way we teach and learn in Brazil. #PosseMEC

585089229832720384.text: It will be like an "Educating Country" that Brazil will take the indispensable step to become, finally, a Country developed and just with its people.

585088888319954944.text: Science Without Borders will continue to bring young people to study in the best universities in the world. #PosseMEC

585088819839557634.text: There will be no retreat in our policy of guaranteeing access to higher education for our young people. #PosseMEC

585088675001856000.text: We will continue to expand the supply of full-time education; the second stage of #Pronatec, we will give emphasis to the Young Apprentice. #PosseMEC

585088563777265664.text: We remain committed to the goal of universal access to education for children aged 4 and 5 by 2016. #PosseMEC

585088470219120640.text: I assure Brazilians that the need to promote adjustments in our economy will not affect the essential and structuring programs of the MEC.

585088155109482497.text: Who will be with the greatest part will be the health and education of this Country. That is what is under discussion, a model of sharing or concession. #PosseMEC

585088022527475712.text: We can not deceive ourselves: what is in dispute is the form of distribution of the pre-salt and who gets the bulk. #PosseMEC

585087843493670912.text: The pre-salt is not promise, it's reality. Today, 669,000 barrels of oil per day are already extracted from the pre-salt fields. #PosseMEC

585087259382284288.text: We have never had so much diversity in our school and college benches. We have done a lot and we will do much more. #PosseMEC

585087195444289536.text: We are building a university with style, face and the colors of the Brazilian people. #PosseMEC

585087112489394177.text: Renato Janine will not lack the dedication and competence necessary to lead the Ministry of Education. #PosseMEC

585087035368730624.text: I thank and wish Cid Gomes every success in his new personal projects. #PosseMEC

578958752159821824.text: It is important to prove that it is possible, yes, to have sustainable, high-quality development based on land reform.

578958705137446912.text: I have a lot to thank you for the MST. An important part of the q was built is the result of having dialogued.

578958509234135041.text: Dialogue is necessarily a position of humility, treating the interlocutor as equal.

578958344033021952.text: We want dialogue, suggestions and q tell us what is working or not. This is how it is perfected. Td is the fruit of effort and work.

578957858630422528.text: To adjust is to give life. It is not because we like to adjust, it is because the country has to continue growing, generating jobs and doing social programs.

578957596868132864.text: We can only overcome this momentary situation of difficulties together. Before, the country was breaking.

578957153622474752.text: We are adjusting, because we can not assume everything. This moment of difficulty is fleeting and conjunctural.

578957123452866560.text: Some things we continue to assume, such as the disbursement of the basic food basket in Brazil. It will continue without tax.

578957076682158080.text: Now, we can not continue absorbing everything. We are not asking p / ngm to take all responsibility.

578956558408769536.text: The government, in the last 6 years, has taken all possible measures so that the crisis does not reach the population of the country.

578956372974444544.text: We have to take another step, based on the cooperative tripod, agroecology and agroindustrialization.

578956327294275585.text: This only occurs with social policy of inclusion and income, work and employment, and family agriculture.

578956300685545472.text: We can put on the breast a medal: social inclusion and overcoming extreme poverty.

578955814251192320.text: There are 12 million places in #Pronatec. Cooperative settlements have to leave the demand for technical training.

578955742666960896.text: My commitment to #MinhaCasaMinhaVida Rural e / o #Pronatec.

578955075927814144.text: We will allow the family farmers to add value to their production and produce industrializing what they plant or create.

578954359855267840.text: We are clear about the importance of credit and the financing of public banks to agroindustrialization.

578953967155200000.text: We open public call to buy organic rice to distribute through the PAA. The government is the example.

578953448764366848.text: The PAA allowed that there was security for the farmer to produce.

578953413968420865.text: I agree with many who say that a great foundation of family farming is the Food Acquisition Program (PAA).

578953376039362560.text: We create credit lines; we create agricultural insurance; we support the purchase of equipment; we extend the offer of technical assistance.

578953356514832384.text: From 2003 to 2014, we had a clear policy of fostering family farming.

578953310562037760.text: As it is a business that is starting, the gov. you have to do the part of it. We're already doing our part.

578952656980439040.text: Here we have a high business to put quality food on the table of the Brazilian people.

578952578660200448.text: This is Brazil that we want. Family farming based on agrarian reform settlements is a big business for families and the country.

578952180729802752.text: This is an experience that worked. We have here the production but also the beneficiation, the bagging ... Soon it will be an industry.

578951844929507328.text: This structure is based on settlement of the agrarian reform, q shows the quality and possibility that a settlement has for Brazil.

578951352166010880.text: I came here to participate in something very important: official opening of the organic rice harvest. Brazil has to know that this is possible.

578650738366238720.text: RT @blogplanalto: The speech of the president @dilmabr ends at the # BRTGoani ceremony. Check out, soon, more stuff at http://t.co/OoaIR15...

578649341734334465.text: I congratulate our partnership on a work that I am very proud of, when it is completed, it will guarantee that there will be no shortage of water in Goiânia until 2050.

578647870187909121.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: All partnerships are essential. Brazil is a big and complex country, it needs partnerships.

578646944781840384.text: All these works will be completed in November of this year.

578646916755529728.text: I bring good news: the works of the patio and the track, which were still, will start in the first week of April.

578646887873568768.text: The new airport terminal is almost ready, and is up to the needs and potential of the capital of Goiás.

578646244370821120.text: The BRT will change the articulation of transportation here in Goiânia. In partnership, we will transform it into one of the main axes of transport.

578646125877547008.text: It is an honor to give the order of service to the BRT North-South. We were able to get the project underway. #Urban mobility

578646083762569216.text: The city has to prepare itself to suit the population. with efficient services. #Urban mobility

578644555966365697.text: It must be a commitment of the q govern the country to ensure that cities are places where living is given in a dignified way. #Urban mobility

578644501025173505.text: We live in a continental country, where a large part of our population lives in cities. Goiânia is one of the great Brazilian metropolis.

578644049571250176.text: We are republican and respect democracy, which was won with much effort and much pain.

578644001940746240.text: We are a democratic Country in which we compete only during the election. When it is over, those elected by the people rule for all.

578261359567245313.text: RT @blogplanalto: # Infographic - Check the measures of the # Anticorruption Package launched by the president @dilmabr: http://t.co/kbeHMlTkWx

578222816320974848.text: We will build this country more just and more equal and, above all, more democratic. #Anti-corruption

578222586737373184.text: I am proud to be the president who has taken the first steps to effectively build this process. #Anti-corruption

578222420001234944.text: We are not the country that boasted of being a people that likes to take advantage. We have to move away from this utilitarian view of relationships.

578221768328003584.text: The time of Brazil to stop these practices, which still insist on running our guts, has arrived. #Anti-corruption

578221285999812609.text: The war against corruption must be a task of all institutions, of government, and a moment of reflection of society. #Anti-corruption

578220964439310336.text: Fighting corruption means democratizing power, because it robs the legitimate power of the people, and diminishes the importance of honest work.

578220578194255872.text: Brazil of hj fights corruption. The news about cases increases but precisely because they are no longer swept under the rug.

578220386745200642.text: It is necessary to punish corrupt and corrupting, quickly and effectively, always guaranteeing the right to adversary and ample defense.

578219992019279872.text: My commitment to fighting corruption is consistent with my personal life and with my political work.

578219582948769792.text: RT @blogplanalto: Dilma: The 6th measure is the decree regulating the Law # Anticporrupção that will also transform into a true law of e ...

578219527747608576.text: The fifth measure is urgently required in the vote on a bill that criminalizes illicit enrichment. #Anti-corruption

578218902485909504.text: The fourth measure is a bill that amends the Server Statute to require #FichaLimpa for servers of the 3 powers in all instances

578218810366386176.text: The third measure is an urgent request from the project on early sale and seizure of illicit assets. #Anti-corruption

578218764975673344.text: The second measure is the proposal for confiscation and return of illegally obtained goods. #Anti-corruption

578218694159036416.text: The first measure is to transform cash practice 2 and laundering of resources for election purposes in crime. #Anti-corruption

578217189439852544.text: RT @blogplanalto: Check out the main measures of the # Anticorruption Package: http://t.co/DHRMsYxqop

578217085219815425.text: We do not compromise with corruption and we are committed to facing impunity that feeds corruption.

578216903031795712.text: This is an essential strategy to deepen democracy itself in Brazil.

578216784236556288.text: We have taken another decisive step to expand the capacity and power of the State to prevent and combat corruption and impunity.

577558032038641664.text: Dilma sanctioned the new Code of Civil Procedure in the Planalto Palace. Logo +, give a press conference. http://t.co/EfUMbQ4nOg

577555955350659072.text: (...) it was worth fighting for freedom, it was worth fighting for democracy! This country is stronger than ever.

577555888346701824.text: Yesterday, when I saw hundreds of thousands of citizens demonstrating through the streets of several Brazilian cities, I could not help but think ...

577555782767607808.text: I have suffered the consequences of the repression to see this country free from censorship, oppression and the prohibition of freedom of expression

577555533844086784.text: Many of my generation gave their lives so that the people could, finally, go to the streets to express themselves.

577555388846977025.text: My tribute to those who contributed to the restoration of democratic freedoms is broad, frank and makes no distinctions.

577555348376182784.text: Recalling the 30 years of redemocratization, I honor all those who fought against the regime of exception and q fought to defend democracy.

577555299801915392.text: We will make the necessary adjustments, dialoguing with everyone, but have no doubt that they will be held in the defense of all Brazilians.

577555255967281152.text: We must repudiate those who believe in "how much worse, better" in politics and economics.

577555169510072322.text: My government has a lot of responsibility with the stability economy, because it is q guaranteeing jobs and stability for our Country.

577554680223518720.text: Now, there are no more resources to continue doing this. We need to make adjustments and corrections to keep growing.

577554531564806144.text: In the fight against the crisis, we use all weapons, subsidies, subsidies and relief to avoid reaching businessmen, middle class and workers

577554184595218432.text: RT @portalbrasil: Dilma: It is with democracy that will overcome the hate, it is with democracy that will fight corruptors and corrupted. #CPC

577554125078007809.text: My commitment is to govern for the 203 million Brazilians.

577554045138776064.text: I reiterate my conviction that the current situation points to the urgent need for a comprehensive #Political Reform.

577554003548049408.text: We will, of course, be open to listening to the whole society for other measures.

577553966055161856.text: In the coming days, as promised in the elections, we will announce a set of measures aimed at combating corruption and impunity.

577553926947491841.text: There was a theme present in both the Friday and Sunday demonstrations: the fight against corruption and impunity.

577553841870270464.text: Therefore, the government hears and will continue to hear street demonstrations.

577553793035968515.text: Just as the polls translate the will of the nation, which can not be disrespected, the streets are the legitimate space of popular demonstration.

577553539079233536.text: Yesterday, hundreds of thousands of Brazilians took to the streets to express themselves freely, peacefully and without violence.

577553440085258240.text: A country that, in the face of invitations to adventures and the breakdown of political normality, chooses the path of democracy and constitutional principles.

577553291153973248.text: This is the Nation we want to strengthen: a place where everyone exercises their rights without disrespect for civil and public liberties.

577552820867637248.text: By oxygenating the legal process, the new code will increase people's trust in justice, strengthening our institutions.

577552635298971648.text: The text arrives in good time, it replaces a code that was + of 40 years, produced during an exception period, and that had been modified.

577552064412278784.text: Justice loses part of its sense and essence when it is rushed and negligent with the broad right of defense, as well as when it is delayed.

577551991783710720.text: Good justice is fast and effective justice.

577551538702405633.text: This new Code identifies itself with the demands of a new country, which in the last decades has become more demanding, + aware of its rights

577551273177849856.text: More Justice for all in a country that has become more just and less unequal for everyone.

577551076162969600.text: The new code further democratizes access to justice by extending and facilitating the gratuity or installment of judicial expenses.

577550923037323264.text: Our new Code of Civil Procedure is born from the search for identity between the social fact and the legal practice, and gives solidity to our democracy.

577550553946927105.text: Under legal and technical language, there are changes in lawsuits that directly affect the lives of most Brazilians.

577550491334373376.text: The sanction of the new Code of Civil Procedure is of great importance to Brazil.

574720100831485952.text: Long live the Brazilian woman! Long live the Brazilian people. Long live Brazil! #DilmaDaMulher

574720074910724096.text: More than ever, it's time to believe in our future. To dream. To have faith and hope. #DilmaDaMulher

574719987262300161.text: Brazil is bigger than all of this and has often shown the world how to do better and different. #DilmaDaMulher

574719961949736960.text: We need to transform difficulties into solutions, temporary problems into permanent advances. #DilmaDaMulher

574719803744784384.text: With concrete and courageous measures, in all areas, we will, together, improve Brazil. It is a joint task of every society.

574719729555927040.text: With this, this heinous crime will have much harder penalties. http://t.co/BKkSIq4LpP # Beijing20 # IWD2015 #DilmaDaMulher

574719678754504704.text: I am going to sanction the Law of the Feminicide that transforms into heinous crime the murder of women. http://t.co/BKkSIq4LpP # Beijing20 # IWD2015

574719599574401025.text: Finally, I want to announce a new step in strengthening justice, in favor of Brazilian women. #DilmaDaMulher

574719515868684289.text: Brazil has learned to practice social justice, as well as hard to apply the hand of justice against corrupt. http://t.co/xbYPeKytm3

574719283529383936.text: Along with the new measures we are maintaining and improving our programs. Delivering great works. #DilmaDaMulher

574719228177215488.text: During the time that lasts, the Country will not stop. On the contrary, we will continue to work, produce, invest and improve. #DilmaDaMulher

574719179753984001.text: We are not taking these measures to return to being equal to what we have already been. But, yes, to be much better. #DilmaDaMulher

574719121285341184.text: (...) nor let their conquests and their rights disappear. #DilmaDaMulher

574719098736738304.text: We will not betray our commitments to the workers and the middle class (...)

574719061143257088.text: Fiscal effort is not an end in itself. It is just the crossing for a better time, which will arrive fast and even more lasting.

574718892033097728.text: Brazil now has more professional qualification, more infrastructure, more opportunities to study and more entrepreneurs. #DilmaDaMulher

574718837557477377.text: The measures will be tolerable because besides being a government that cares about the population, we have a stronger people today than ever before.

574718770603769857.text: We are doing everything with balance so that we have as much correction as possible with the least possible sacrifice. #Woman's Day

574718642853646337.text: And we are implementing measures that reduce, in part, credit subsidies and also tax exemptions. #DilmaDaMulher

574718541808713728.text: We review certain distortions in some benefits while preserving the sacred rights of workers. #DilmaDaMulher

574718469423374336.text: That's why we started cutting government spending, without significantly affecting priority investments and social programs.

574718400083197952.text: Sometimes we have to control spending more to keep our budget out of control. #DilmaDaMulher

574717941176008705.text: If we get those victories before, we have everything to get new wins again. #DilmaDaMulher

574717885928632320.text: The + important: while in the other countries there were mass layoffs, we here preserve and increase employment and wages. #DilmaDaMulher

574717767624097792.text: For the first time in history, Brazil, faced with an international economic crisis, did not suffer a financial and foreign exchange loss. #DilmaDaMulher

574717711776940034.text: Brazil is laying the foundations to face the crisis and take a new leap in its development. http://t.co/jpdYydkv9S #DilmaDaMulher

574717653740306432.text: We have deep commitments to the country's future and we will continue to adhere to these commitments in an unshakable way. #DilmaDaMulher

574717599646359553.text: As always, especially protecting the working classes, the middle classes and the most vulnerable sectors. #DilmaDaMulher

574717553932697600.text: We want and know how to do this, distributing efforts in a fair and bearable way for everyone. #DilmaDaMulher

574717498072895488.text: Brazil has all the conditions to overcome these temporary problems. I ask you to join us. http://t.co/H1pwSHJjv7 #DilmaDaMulher

574717423376535552.text: Among many serious effects, this drought has brought temporary increases in the cost of energy and some food. #DilmaDaMulher

574717375624388608.text: There is also the coincidence that we are facing the greatest drought in our history, in the Southeast and Northeast. #DilmaDaMulher

574717330036539394.text: The circumstances changed because in addition to certain problems have worsened - in Brazil and in much of the world. #DilmaDaMulher

574717244028157952.text: As the world changed, Brazil changed and circumstances changed, we also had to change the way we deal with the problems. #DilmaDaMulher

574717162205659136.text: And, in this second stage, we are having to use different and tougher weapons than the ones we used at first. #DilmaDaMulher

574717107583258624.text: The central question is this: we are in the second stage of the fight against the serious international crisis since the great depression of 1929 #DilmaDaMulher

574717044316332032.text: Nor will they make Brazil stop or compromise our future. #DilmaDaMulher

574716997965070336.text: The difficulties that exist - and the measures we are taking to overcome them - will not compromise your achievements. #DilmaDaMulher

574716944252866560.text: Our people are protected in what is most important: their ability to produce, earn their income and protect their family. #DilmaDaMulher

574716858395455488.text: Very different from those crises of the past that broke and paralyzed the Country. #DilmaDaMulher

574716813071773696.text: We are experiencing short-term problems, but our fundamentals remain solid. #DilmaDaMulher

574716758197731329.text: Brazil is going through a different moment from what we have experienced in recent years. But he is not living a crisis in the dimensions that some say.

574716646146850816.text: I have information that if shared will help them to better understand the moment we spend and to renew faith and hope in Brazil!

574716555369537536.text: Conversations at home, and at work, must also be completed by data that is not always available to everyone. #DilmaDaMulher

574716501179170816.text: News is useful, but not always enough. Often they confuse us more than they clarify us. #DilmaDaMulher

574716420862439425.text: To speak to you women - my friends and my equals - is to speak with the heart and soul of our great nation. #DilmaDaMulher

573853638080208896.text: (...) have a prosperous economy, continue to generate employment and income for the population.

573853601757544448.text: We are making an immense effort so that Brazil not only continues to make social programs, but also expand the investments (...)

573852281571033089.text: Our project is to continue generating employment, guaranteeing wages and programs such as #MinhaCasaMinhaVida and #Pronatec, for example.

571708752925233153.text: Dilma and Mujica, in Uruguay, where they inaugurated the #Artilleros wind farm, made in partnership between Eletrobras and UTE. http://t.co/9Tqxcpl7QF

571705196142833665.text: We will work to ensure that we have a Latin America of Pepe Mujica's dreams: democratic, libertarian and developed.

571705107945017344.text: I am committed to working shoulder to shoulder with him every day, both in our relations and in multilateral relations.

571705017209634816.text: I am sure that relations between Brazil and Uruguay will be deepened with the arrival of President Tabaré.

571704334074974208.text: It is possible, yes, integration, with both sides gaining and respecting, generating employment and absorption of technology for the two countries.

571704027689443328.text: It is part of a vision of integration between Brazil and Uruguay, and is a model that we have to follow to build other countries with our integration.

571703820356603904.text: This is the first investment of Eletrobras abroad, in partnership with UTE, Uruguay.

571703762399727616.text: From our bilateral relations, we have proven that it is possible to achieve greater approximation and integration between our countries through common actions.

571703644271316994.text: Pepe is committed to democracy and human rights. I have the honor to be here at this special time.

571703578315898880.text: Pepe is not only committed to all of Uruguay's important interests but also to Brazil and other Latin American countries.

571703489132408832.text: I am thrilled to be here when Pepe Mujica left the Uruguayan government.

571388915434831872.text: The guarantee is not 10 min, it is 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, rain or shine. #Geribatu

571388714989039616.text: I fought a lot for energy security, which requires people to produce the necessary energy for the growth of the country and the comfort of the population.

550712733151551491.text: It clearly reflects our high priority and signals which sector the effort of all areas of government should converge.

550711599624122368.text: Let us + once defeat the false thesis that there is a conflict between economic stability and social investment and infrastructure.

550711495924146176.text: We are aware that the expansion and sustainability of social policies require equity and correction of distortions and eventual excesses.

550711450898276353.text: I reaffirm my deep commitment to the maintenance of all labor and social security rights. #DayDream

550709695733055488.text: The Brazilian people want education, health, and security of more quality. #DayDream

550709645724381184.text: The Brazilian people want to democratize, more and more income, knowledge and power. #DayDream

550709590867058688.text: We will need, government and society of patience, courage, persistence, balance and humility to overcome obstacles. And we will win.

550709548303286275.text: Yes, at this time, instead of simply ensuring the minimum necessary, we have to strive to offer as much as possible.

550709487997583360.text: It is time to improve what is good, correct what it takes and do what people expect of us. #DayDream

550709413607403521.text: Now is the time to continue with our project, to pursue new goals. #DayDream

550709332435034112.text: But as I said - and I know it is the expectation of all Brazilians - the end of misery is only a beginning. #DayDream

550709098808107008.text: (...) of laws, individual freedoms, democratic rights, broader freedom of expression and human rights.

550709049596313600.text: I also want to renew, in this House, my commitment of permanent and obstinate defense of the Constitution (...)

550708986228785153.text: It is the inauguration of a new stage in this historical process of social changes in Brazil. #DayDream

550708936438194178.text: This act of possession is, above all, a ceremony of reassertion and enlargement of commitments. #DayDream

550708502008967168.text: The institutions have never been so strengthened and respected, and corruption has never been so thoroughly investigated and punished. #DayDream

550708464763559936.text: Brazil has never lived such a long period without institutional crises. #DayDream

550708251663564800.text: Never has the minimum wage and other wages valued for so long and so vigorously. #DayDream

550708206922903553.text: Never have so many Brazilians ascended to the middle classes. Never have so many Brazilians won so many jobs with a formal contract.

550707879846891521.text: The nation project that holds the deepest and most lasting popular support of our democratic history. #DayDream

545702661367271424.text: (...) q accompany me on this journey of transformation and changes in Brazil.

545702627217244160.text: It is with hope, with great faith and courage, + once, I summon all men and women of good will (...)

545702577766408193.text: I am one of those women who dedicate their entire existence, and are able to give their lives for the sake of their families, their people and their Country.

545702479636492288.text: I am one of those women who do not give up, nor allow themselves to be overcome by adversity.

545702130695544834.text: Petrobrás and Brazil are bigger than q qlq problem and crisis, so we have the capacity to overcome them and to emerge better and stronger.

545701969135165441.text: We must, above all, create mechanisms to prevent such events from happening again.

545701947651944449.text: We have to rigorously investigate everything wrong that was done.

545701862067146752.text: We are facing this situation with fearlessness and we will convert the renewal of Petrobrás into transforming energy of our Country.

545701820036022272.text: Some Petrobras employees were hit in the anti-corruption process.

545701584030945281.text: I know this is a work of more than a generation. I want to be the president who helped make this process irreversible.

545701536568184832.text: We must create a new awareness of public morality and imbue this spirit with the present and next generations.

545701249853960192.text: We can not turn a blind eye to an indisputable truth: it is time for Brazil to stop corruption.

545700646369128448.text: (...) and, from this level, made concrete in the determination to find and punish all kinds of irregularities and badly done.

545700606577766401.text: Commitment to ethics mirrored, first, in the example of integrity and personal honesty (...)

545700524356812801.text: Governance structured in a solid majority in Congress and in popular participation.

545700473563807746.text: Stability based on sustained growth, on inflation control, on growth q will accelerate faster than some would imagine.

545700407230857216.text: Social justice founded on the struggle for the reduction of inequality, distribution of income, guarantee of employment, salary and human rights.

545700302276820993.text: (...), economic and political stability, and commitment to ethics.

545700275001257985.text: What I want to offer my country is the renewed struggle for social justice, quality education, equal opportunities (...)

545700139294552064.text: Commitments already known, announced and applied, throughout my life, from my first government and my campaign.

545700087494901761.text: What I have the best and I want in a renewed way to offer my country is the fidelity to my convictions and the breadth of my commitments.

545700023099740160.text: To know how to win is to break free from the bonds of individual and partisan interests, and to offer, with courage, what we have best for our Country

545699910503641089.text: To know how to overcome is to recognize the right to a dignified life for all and to strive with all the strength to make it a reality.

545699808036810753.text: More important and more difficult than knowing how to lose is knowing how to win.

545699722976321536.text: It is up to those who were chosen to govern, to govern well. It is up to those who have been chosen to oppose, to the best of their ability, their role.

545699601588944896.text: The people, in their wisdom, choose who he wants to govern and whom he wants to be opposed. That simple.

545699554243649536.text: The elections in Brazil have been a permanent proof that our democracy is solid and that our institutions work better and better.

545699318003662849.text: We are a nation built with the signs of courage, faith and hope, and these signs give us the vital force to move forward.

545699272629686272.text: But it fills my heart, above all, with hope - and it is this hope that I want to share with all the Brazilian people.

545699223770238978.text: Being the first woman elected and re-elected to occupy the highest office of the nation leaves my soul full of joy, responsibility and fearlessness.

545699132011450370.text: Fulfilling the popular will is a generous mission because instead of oppressing it it frees us; and instead of weakening it strengthens us

545699072108396544.text: As well as that of using my authority to make them respected, no matter what sacrifice becomes necessary.

545699025086054400.text: By virtue of this imperative, I receive this diploma renewing my oath to obey, in any circumstance, the laws of my Country.

545698958505705472.text: We are fulfilling the desire of the majority of the Brazilian people, legitimized by the strong + power of democracy, which emanates from the popular vote.

538093269285351426.text: I look forward to your contributions, we will continue to build together a priority path that also focuses on #Solidary Economics.

538092824039002113.text: The promotion of #Solidaria Economy will undoubtedly be among our priorities.

538092745236414464.text: (...) political and economic stability, investment in infrastructure and modernization of the country and raising the income of the people.

538092667180429312.text: I will continue to prioritize social inclusion, employment, access to education, guarantee of rights (...)

538092624696324096.text: I received a new mandate from the Brazilian people to continue making changes. #Solidarity economy

538092097350676481.text: We will further strengthen solidarity projects throughout the country. #Solidary economy

538091888331718656.text: In the next 4 years, I will establish constructive and ongoing dialogue with you. #Solidarity economy

538091743095574529.text: All of you, delegates and delegates, were partners and protagonists in the construction of these policies. #Solidarity economy

538091012061925376.text: Our commitment is to create opportunities in a very simple way: opening doors. #Solidarity economy

538090661992726531.text: With the regulation of cooperatives, we have opened opportunities in the world of work for traditionally excluded segments. #Solidarity economy

538090443133952003.text: We have made progress in the modernization of legislation to support cooperatives and we have established the National Program for the Promotion of Cooperatives.

538090154209329152.text: We create opportunities for thousands of Brazilians who believe in cooperation and self-management as a solution to economic and social problems.

538089789992730624.text: Institutionalized # Solidarity Economy, we created the Secretariat of Solidarity Economy and we have to recognize the leadership of Paul Singer.

538089494726344704.text: We have a development model that recognizes and values ​​#Solidaria Economics as a legitimate and necessary form of work organization.

537982679502061568.text: Ending illegal deforestation in # Amazônia is my government's commitment.

537982617011122177.text: This is the result of our policy that strengthened the fight against illegal deforestation and invested in sustainable production practices.

537982455371014144.text: The average annual rate in my current term was 5,432 km², almost half of the previous record (9,757 km²) recorded between 2007/2010.

537982337192296448.text: In my government, we have achieved the lowest rates of deforestation in the Amazon region in history.

537982246557585410.text: Deforestation in the Legal Amazon decreased by 18% compared to 2013. 4,848 km² were deforested, the second lowest rate ever recorded.
